thread.section_title: Archive News & Video for Monday, 22 Jan 2018 | Reuters.com
thread.title: BRIEF-Fitch Says Eurozone Housing, Mortgage Recovery To Continue In 2018

author: Reuters Editorial
title: BRIEF-Fitch Says Eurozone Housing, Mortgage Recovery To Continue In 2018
text:
Jan 22 (Reuters) - Fitch
* FITCH SAYS EUROZONE HOUSING, MORTGAGE RECOVERY TO CONTINUE IN 2018
* FITCH SAYS ‍OUTSIDE SINGLE CURRENCY BLOC, BREXIT UNCERTAINTY WILL CONTINUE TO WEIGH ON UK AND NORWEGIAN PRICES WILL FALL​
* FITCH SAYS ‍AVERAGE RENTS REMAIN HIGH, BUT WOULD SUFFER IN LONDON AND SOUTH EAST IF BREXIT SAW A NET OUTWARD MIGRATION OF WORKERS​
* FITCH SAYS FORECAST ZERO GROWTH IN UK PRICES IN 2018, SMALL DROP IN LONDON & SOUTH EAST, A CONSEQUENCE OF BREXIT UNCERTAINTY, STRETCHED AFFORDABILITY Source text for Eikon:
